https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lBwOEpwVeUAmrmglcstnaGcJq3Y.jpg The Man With No Name enters the Mexican village of San Miguel in the midst of a power struggle among the three Rojo brothers and sheriff John Baxter. When a regiment of Mexican soldiers bearing gold intended to pay for new weapons is waylaid by the Rojo brothers, the stranger inserts himself into the middle of the long-simmering battle, selling false information to both sides for his own benefit. A Fistful of Dollars
